hammer.api

Annotation Type Multiton


  • @Target(value={ANNOTATION_TYPE,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Multiton
 @Scope
public @interface Multiton
    A Multiton is a special type of @Scope annotation that is given special semantic meaning when used with an Injector. A Multiton annotation has distinct meaning in two contexts:
    1. When added as an annotation on a class, and that class is added as an implementation type in an Injector. In this scenario, when injecting instances of the given implementation type, the injector treats the type as a muliton, associating one instance per Qualifier. In other words, for every injection request that resolves to the implementation type and is associated with a specific Qualifier instance, the same instance will be used.
    2. When added as an annotation on an annotation type that is also annotated with the Scope annotation. In this scenario, if the annotated Scope annotation is used as an active scope in an Injector, the custom annotation will be treated as a multiton annotation, with the same behavior as the Multiton scope.
